model.name: MultiTrigger
model.description: Plays back a single or multiple sources with multiple voices (polyphony) repeatedly.

param.name: pitchShift
param.description: Amount of pitch shift of the source in the each playback (in semitones).

param.name: pitchRand
param.description: Maximum value for random pitch shift of the triggered voices (in semitones).

param.name: eventRand
param.description: Enable randomness in the order of sources which are triggered.

param.name: eventRate
param.description: Rate at which the sources are triggered (in Hz).

param.name: eventJitter
param.description: Maximum deviation from the regular trigger interval (as a factor of 1).

param.name: gain
param.description: The volume (loudness) of the audio produced by the model.

param.name: pan
param.description: Left/Right panning (in degrees) of the position of the source with respect to the listener
